title: Foundations of National External Debt Sustainability Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational macroeconomic concepts (exchange rates, fiscal policy, etc.) and basic understanding of data analysis
context.additional_context: Learners cultivate the ability to evaluate national debt issues from multiple perspectives through scientific analysis methods and practice data-driven decision-making using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can explain key economic indicators (inflation, exchange rates, fiscal balance, etc.) for assessing national debt sustainability.
Learners can compare and explain differences between machine learning classification models and traditional econometric methods.
Learners can perform a step-by-step process to analyze national debt risk levels using real-world country data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
